verses.verse: "Moreover you shall make <S%H6213><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> with ten <S%H6235><s%> curtains; <S%H3407><s%> of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> and blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> with cherubim. <S%H4639><s%> The work of the skillful <S%H2803><s%> workman <S%H4639><s%> you shall make them. <S%H6213><s%>

The length <S%H753><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> shall be twenty <S%H6242><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cubits: <S%H520><s%> all the curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall have one <S%H259><s%> measure. <S%H4060><s%>

Five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall be coupled together <S%H2266><s%> one <S%H802><s%> to another; <S%H269><s%> and the other five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall be coupled <S%H2266><s%> one <S%H802><s%> to another. <S%H269><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%> on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> from the edge <S%H7098><s%> in the coupling; <S%H2279><s%> and likewise you shall make <S%H6213><s%> in the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> that is outmost <S%H7020><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> coupling. <S%H4225><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> in the one <S%H259><s%> curtain, <S%H3407><s%> and you shall make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> that is in the second <S%H8145><s%> coupling. <S%H4225><s%> The loops <S%H3924><s%> shall be opposite <S%H6901><s%> one <S%H802><s%> to another. <S%H269><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> clasps <S%H7165><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and couple <S%H2266><s%> the curtains <S%H3407><s%> one to another with <S%H802><s%> the clasps: <S%H7165><s%> and the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> shall be a unit. <S%H259><s%>

"You shall make <S%H6213><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> of goats <S%H5795><s%>' hair for a covering <S%H168><s%> over the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%> You shall make <S%H6213><s%> them eleven <S%H6249><s%> curtains. <S%H3407><s%>

The length <S%H753><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> shall be thirty <S%H7970><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cubits: <S%H520><s%> the eleven <S%H6249><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall have one <S%H259><s%> measure. <S%H4060><s%>

You shall couple <S%H2266><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> by themselves, <S%H8337><s%> and six curtains <S%H3407><s%> by themselves, <S%H3717><s%> and shall double over the sixth <S%H8345><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> in the forefront <S%H4136><s%> of the tent. <S%H168><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> that is outmost <S%H7020><s%> in the coupling, <S%H2279><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> which is outmost in the second <S%H8145><s%> coupling. <S%H2279><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> clasps <S%H7165><s%> of brass, <S%H5178><s%> and put <S%H935><s%> the clasps <S%H7165><s%> into the loops, <S%H3924><s%> and couple <S%H2266><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> together, <S%H259><s%> that it may be one.

The overhanging <S%H5629><s%> part that remains <S%H5736><s%> of the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of the tent, <S%H168><s%> the half <S%H2677><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> that remains, <S%H5736><s%> shall hang <S%H5628><s%> over the back <S%H268><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

The cubit <S%H520><s%> on the one side, <S%H2088><s%> and the cubit <S%H520><s%> on the other side, <S%H5736><s%> of that which remains in the length <S%H753><s%> of the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of the tent, <S%H168><s%> shall hang <S%H5628><s%> over the sides <S%H6654><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> on this side and on that side, <S%H3680><s%> to cover it.

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> a covering <S%H4372><s%> for the tent <S%H168><s%> of rams <S%H352><s%>' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red, <S%H119><s%> and a covering <S%H4372><s%> of sea cow <S%H8476><s%> hides <S%H5785><s%> above. <S%H4605><s%>
"You shall make <S%H6213><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> for the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> standing up. <S%H5975><s%>

Ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> of a board, <S%H7175><s%> and one and a half <S%H2677><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> board. <S%H7175><s%>

There shall be two <S%H8147><s%> tenons <S%H3027><s%> in each <S%H259><s%> board, <S%H7175><s%> joined to <S%H7947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> another: <S%H269><s%> thus you shall make <S%H6213><s%> for all the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> for the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> for the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward. <S%H8486><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> under the twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards; <S%H7175><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under one <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> for its two <S%H8147><s%> tenons, <S%H3027><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under another <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> for its two <S%H8147><s%> tenons. <S%H3027><s%>
For the second <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side, <S%H6763><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards, <S%H7175><s%>

and their forty <S%H705><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver; <S%H3701><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under one <S%H259><s%> board, <S%H7175><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under another <S%H259><s%> board. <S%H7175><s%>
For the far part <S%H3411><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> boards. <S%H7175><s%>
You shall make <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> for the corners <S%H4742><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> in the far part. <S%H3411><s%>

They shall be double <S%H8382><s%> beneath, <S%H4295><s%> and in the same way <S%H8382><s%> they <S%H3162><s%> shall be whole to its top <S%H7218><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> ring: <S%H2885><s%> thus shall it be for them both; <S%H8147><s%> they shall be for the two <S%H8147><s%> corners. <S%H4740><s%>

There shall be eight <S%H8083><s%> boards, <S%H7175><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> sixteen <S%H8337><s%> sockets; <S%H134><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under one <S%H259><s%> board, <S%H7175><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under another <S%H259><s%> board. <S%H7175><s%>

"You shall make <S%H6213><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood: <S%H6086><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%>

and five <S%H2568><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> for the far part <S%H3411><s%> westward. <S%H3220><s%>
The middle <S%H8484><s%> bar <S%H1280><s%> in the midst <S%H8484><s%> of the boards <S%H7175><s%> shall pass <S%H1272><s%> through from end <S%H7097><s%> to end. <S%H7097><s%>

You shall overlay <S%H6823><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> with gold, <S%H2091><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> their rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for places <S%H1004><s%> for the bars: <S%H1280><s%> and you shall overlay <S%H6823><s%> the bars <S%H1280><s%> with gold. <S%H2091><s%>
You shall set up <S%H6965><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> according to the way <S%H4941><s%> that it was shown <S%H7200><s%> to you on the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

"You shall make <S%H6213><s%> a veil <S%H6532><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> with cherubim. <S%H3742><s%> The work <S%H4639><s%> of the skillful <S%H2803><s%> workman shall it be made. <S%H6213><s%>

You shall hang <S%H5414><s%> it on four <S%H702><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> overlaid <S%H6823><s%> with gold; <S%H2091><s%> their hooks <S%H2053><s%> shall be of gold, <S%H2091><s%> on four <S%H702><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

You shall hang up <S%H5414><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> under the clasps, <S%H7165><s%> and shall bring <S%H935><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> in there within <S%H1004><s%> the veil: <S%H6532><s%> and the veil <S%H6532><s%> shall separate <S%H914><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> place from the most <S%H6944><s%> holy for you. <S%H6944><s%>
You shall put <S%H5414><s%> the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> on the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> in the most <S%H6944><s%> holy place. <S%H6944><s%>

You shall set <S%H7760><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> the veil, <S%H6532><s%> and the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> over against <S%H5227><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> on the side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> toward the south: <S%H8486><s%> and you shall put <S%H5414><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side. <S%H6763><s%>

"You shall make <S%H6213><s%> a screen <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent, <S%H168><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of the embroiderer. <S%H7551><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> for the screen <S%H4539><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> of acacia, <S%H7848><s%> and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with gold: <S%H2091><s%> their hooks <S%H2053><s%> shall be of gold: <S%H2091><s%> and you shall cast <S%H3332><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of brass for them. <S%H5178><s%>
